## ICredentialStatusManager interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Credential status manager interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICredentialStatusManager extends IPluginMethodMap
```

<b>Extends:</b> [IPluginMethodMap](./core.ipluginmethodmap.md)

## Methods

| Method                                                                                        | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [credentialStatusGenerate(args)](./core.icredentialstatusmanager.credentialstatusgenerate.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Generates a <code>credentialStatus</code> property for a future credential, not yet signed.This method is used during the creation of a [VerifiableCredential](./core.verifiablecredential.md) in order to make it capable of having its status updated later (to be revoked). |
| [credentialStatusTypes()](./core.icredentialstatusmanager.credentialstatustypes.md)           | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> List all the credential status types (methods) available in the current agent instance.                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [credentialStatusUpdate(args)](./core.icredentialstatusmanager.credentialstatusupdate.md)     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Changes the status of an existing [VerifiableCredential](./core.verifiablecredential.md). Commonly used to revoke an existing credential.                                                                                                                                      |
